flavor: Her father was growing weaker and more delirious with every passing day, waking only to mutter, "Tansy," and beg forgiveness.
name: Hoster Tully
text: While Hoster Tully is participating in a challenge, each other participating House Tully character you control gains renown.

name: The Tumblestone
text: Bestow (3). Reaction: After a House Tully character gains power, discard 1 gold from The Tumblestone to stand that character.

flavor: Margaery's kindness had been unfailing, and her presence changed everything.
name: Margaery Tyrell
text: Renown. Reaction: After a unique King or Lord character you control is killed, search your deck for a unique King or Lord character and put it into play. Shuffle your deck. (Limit once per round.)

flavor: "...but the ones in motley are more amusing than ones with crowns." <cite>The Queen of Thorns</cite>
name: All Men Are Fools
text: Reaction: After you win a challenge by 5 or more STR, each Lady character you control gains 1 power. (Max 1 per challenge.)

flavor: Eastwatch was a better place to trade than Castle Black; that was where the ships came, laden with goods from the fabled lands beyond the sea.
name: Eastwatch Carpenter
text: No attachments except Weapon. Reaction: After you collect income, gain 1 gold for every 2 [thenightswatch] locations you control.

name: Eastwatch-by-the-Sea
text: Reaction: After the dominance phase begins, if you have a higher reserve value than an opponent, draw 1 card. +1 Reserve.

name: Fickle Bannerman
text: Bestow (2). Renown. Forced Reaction: After you lose a [power] challenge, the winning opponent takes control of Fickle Bannerman unless you discard 1 gold from it.

flavor: "There are spells woven into the stones. Dark walls that no shadow can pass â€” ancient, forgotten, yet still in place." <cite>Melisandre</cite>
name: Storm's End
text: Reaction: After you win dominance, discard 1 power from your faction card to choose 2 characters. Each of those characters gains 1 power.

name: Stone Crows
text: Ambush (3). Bestow (2). Reaction: After you win a challenge in which Stone Crows is attacking, discard 1 gold from it to have the losing opponent choose and kill a defending character.

flavor: "The Blackfish was my Knight of the Gate, and since he left us the mountain clans are growing very bold." <cite>Lysa Arryn</cite>
name: Attack From the Mountains
text: Reaction: After you win a challenge in which you control an attacking Clansman character, put a Clansman character into play from your hand.

flavor: "Comforts I shall know in the Drowned God's watery halls beneath the waves." <cite>Aeron Damphair</cite>
name: Drowned Disciple
text: Reaction: After a character enters play from your dead pile, choose a Drowned God character and have it gain 1 power. (Limit twice per phase.)

name: Moat Cailin
text: While there are more Winter plot cards than Summer plot cards revealed, reduce the initiative value on each opponent's revealed plot card by 3, and the reserve value on each opponent's revealed plot card by 1.

flavor: "Ours is the blood of ancient Ghis, whose empire was old when Valyria was yet a squalling child." <cite>Grazdan mo Eraz</cite>
name: Ghiscari Elite
text: Reaction: After Ghiscari Elite is knelt, choose an attachment or event in your discard pile, and place it on the bottom of your deck.

name: Slaver's Bay Port
text: Limited. Marshaling Action: Kneel Slaver's Bay Port to gain 1 gold. (2 gold instead if an opponent has 4 or more characters in his or her dead pile.)

name: Ricasso
text:
Bestow (2). (When this card enters play, move up to 2 gold from your gold pool to this card.)
You are considered to have X additional plot cards in your used pile. X is the number of gold Ricasso has.

name: The Prince's Plan
text: Action: Choose a character. Until the end of the phase, that character gets +1 STR for each plot card in your used pile and gains a challenge icon of your choice. Reaction: After you lose a challenge, pay 1 gold to return The Prince's Plan from your discard pile to your hand.

name: Ygritte
text: Ygritte cannot be knelt by card effects. While you control another Wildling character, Ygritte gains stealth.

name: Alliance
text: Your minimum deck size is 75 cards. You may run 2 Banner agendas in addition to this agenda.

name: Barring the Gates
text: Card abilities cannot cause characters to enter play.

name: Late Summer Feast
text: Forced Reaction: After you win a challenge, the losing opponent may draw 1 card.
